title: Basil Hassan
text: Basil Hassan is an external operations plotter for <a href="Islamic%20State%20of%20Iraq%20and%20the%20Levant">Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant</a> (ISIL). In 2013, Hassan was accused of shooting <a href="Lars%20Hedegaard">Lars Hedegaard</a>, a 70-year old Danish author and journalist. After being arrested in <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a> in 2014, he was released as part of an alleged exchange for 49 hostages held by the ISIL. After his release, Hassan was believed to have travelled to <a href="Syria">Syria</a> to join ISIL. In November 2016, the <a href="United%20States%20Department%20of%20State">US State Department</a> issued a note, designating three persons as terror-operatives. He was later revealed as the mastermind of a failed attempt to blow up a long distance plane, in what has now been cited as the most ingenious ISIS terror project.
